column3: Time to see what aetheric conversion's done to me hammer─an' what that'll do to yer phantom weapon!
Success! If ye'd asked me but moments ago, I'd have sworn ye couldn't achieve aetheric harmony as perfect as this...
Behold the frightenin' power o' the void made manifest: <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/>!
Behold the frightenin' power o' the void made manifest: <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/> an' <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(2),1,1)/>!
See how that suits ye. 'Course, unless you put in the practice, even the finest arms'll feel like a lump o' scrap iron in yer hands.
In other words, ye've got to use the bleedin' thing. Swing it about, fell some fiends─do what ye do best, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>!
